Name: Legal Aid ACT – War Veterans’ Matters
Notes: Provides free legal advice and assistance to ACT veterans on war-related compensation claims and appeals​dva.gov.au​legalaidact.org.au.

Name: Legal Aid NSW – Veterans’ Advocacy Service
Street Address: Ground Fl, 323 Castlereagh St, Haymarket, Sydney
Notes: State-wide legal advocacy service for veterans and dependents; assists with DVA claims and appeals at no cost​linc.org.au​bmvets.com.au.

Name: Legal Aid QLD – War Veterans’ Legal Aid Scheme
Notes: Federal-funded scheme offering free legal help for eligible veterans to appeal Veterans’ Review Board decisions on disability pensions​mycitylogan.com.au​mycitylogan.com.au.

Name: RSL ACT (ACT Branch)
Notes: Territory branch of the RSL; provides advocacy and welfare support to ACT ex-service personnel (claims advice, referrals, etc.)​rslqld.org.

Name: RSL New South Wales
Notes: State RSL branch representing NSW veterans. Delivers claims and rehabilitation support via RSL LifeCare Veteran Services​rslqld.org.

Name: RSL Queensland
Street Address: 283 St Pauls Terrace, Fortitude Valley, Brisbane
Notes: Largest ex-service organisation in QLD; 230+ sub-branches with trained volunteer Compensation Advocates providing free DVA claims assistance​rslqld.org​whitepages.com.au.

Name: RSL South Australia
Street Address: Torrens Training Depot, Victoria Drive, Adelaide
Notes: State RSL branch (also servicing NT); offers advocacy for veterans’ compensation claims and general welfare support services​rslqld.org.

Name: RSL Tasmania
Street Address: 206 New Town Road, New Town, Hobart
Notes: State RSL branch providing veteran support in Tasmania, including assistance with DVA compensation and rehabilitation entitlements​rslqld.org.

Name: RSL Victoria (Veteran Central)
Notes: State RSL branch; offers Military Compensation Advocacy – free expert advice and assistance with DVA claims/appeals via Veteran Central​rslvic.com.au​rslvic.com.au.

Name: RSL Western Australia
Notes: State RSL branch in WA; provides claims advocacy (pensions/compensation) and veteran welfare services through trained advocates​rslqld.org.

Name: RSL LifeCare Veteran Services (DefenceCare)
Street Address: Level 5, 120 Pacific Hwy, St Leonards, Sydney
Notes: RSL NSW-affiliated charity (formerly DefenceCare) providing free DVA claims lodging, advocacy at VRB/AAT, emergency financial help, and wellbeing support​rsllifecare.org.au​engage.forcenet.gov.au.

Name: Vietnam Veterans Federation of Australia (VVFA)
Street Address: Veterans Support Centre, 8 Mary Street, Granville
Notes: ESO operated by Vietnam veterans; its support centre has accredited advocates to help all veterans with DVA compensation claims and appeals​dva.gov.au.

Name: Mates4Mates (Family Recovery Centre)
Notes: Not-for-profit founded by RSL QLD offering rehabilitation services for veterans and families – physical rehab, mental health programs, etc.​dva.gov.au.

Name: Soldier On Australia
Street Address: Bldg 2, Suite 5, Brindabella Cct, Canberra Airport
Notes: National charity supporting veterans’ transition and wellbeing (employment, education, psychological rehab). Offers referral and advocacy for service-related needs​dva.gov.au​soldieron.org.au.
